item.description:
Agenda:

4:00 Names.
What are you working on?

4:30 Games.
Bring writing implements. Pen & Paper, keyboard, whatever you feel freest with.
We will play some word games or do a writing exercise.

5:00 Open Discussion. Do you have anything in particular that's giving you trouble in your writing?

6:00 Go Home and Write!

The Lincoln Street Cafe is at the Newton Highlands stop on the Green D Line, or the Lincoln Street stop for the 59 bus. Since it's small, there's an semi-official limit of 8 people. When more than that show up, the group tends to break into smaller groups and keep going.

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
